attributes.additional_details: This petition is to get some traffic calming measures put in place on the B2231 (lower road) Minster, isle of sheppy. This is following an accident on the 15th october 2011, where a young boy, Miles Rogers was knocked down by a car and left critically injured. He is stil, currently in hospital. If we could get some traffic calming measures put in place then children and their parents could cross the road in a safe way.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
